org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api
Interface CoreGenericDao

All Known Subinterfaces:
InitializingCoreGenericDAO
public interface CoreGenericDao

This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object. It also includes the methods needed for managing the DAO.

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (aaronz@vt.edu)

Method Summary

          Get a copy of the list of persistent classes that this DAO will handle

          This allows us to wrap our dao so that it can still load transactional data (lazily for example) outside the normal transaction
 void save(Object object)
          Saves the object and transforms it into a persistent object if it is not already one and assigns it an id, if is already persistent then the object is updated
 

Method Detail

getPersistentClasses

List<String> getPersistentClasses()
Get a copy of the list of persistent classes that this DAO will handle

Returns:
a list of Class objects representing the types of persistent objects

invokeTransactionalAccess

void invokeTransactionalAccess(Runnable toinvoke)
This allows us to wrap our dao so that it can still load transactional data (lazily for example) outside the normal transaction

Parameters:
toinvoke - a Runnable wrapper from the tool layer

getIdProperty

<T> String getIdProperty(Class<T> entityClass)
Get the id (unique identifier, often the primary key) of the persistent class

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
Returns:
the property of the persistent object or null if it cannot be found

findById

<T> T findById(Class<T> entityClass,
               Serializable id)
Find an object based on an id and return the persistent version of it

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
id - the unique id of the object
Returns:
the persistent object or null if it cannot be found

save

void save(Object object)
Saves the object and transforms it into a persistent object if it is not already one and assigns it an id, if is already persistent then the object is updated

Parameters:
object - the persistent type object to save (must have associated hbm file)

delete

<T> boolean delete(Class<T> entityClass,
                   Serializable id)
Deletes the object represented by this id

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
id - the identifier of the object to delete
Returns:
true if deleted, false otherwise
